Sentencas: Complex porous structure and properties of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode significantly affect the SOFC performance.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: In this study, the sintering process of the typical NiO-YSZ anode is simulated by a coarse-grained molecular dynamics method.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: After the sintering process simulation, the porous nanostructure is obtained and the thermophysical properties of the sintered anode are evaluated.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: It is found that the volume shrinkage occurs along with the self-assembly phenomenon during the sintering process.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: Sintering at relatively low temperature and high pressure could contribute to the densification of the anode.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: Compared with the experimental structure, the sintered anode obtained from this study shows a common morphology.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: Sintering at the nanoscale is beneficial to distribute the functional components equally.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: Furthermore, the effects of the sintering temperature, sintering pressure and material composition on the volumetric heat capacity and thermal expansion coefficient of the sintered anode are systematically discussed.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: The predicted thermophysical properties of the anode agree well with the open literature data.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties

Sentencas: Results in this study could provide a guide of the sintering conditions and composition during the experimental studies to obtain the desired properties of the SOFC anode.
Titulo: Sintering process simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell anode and its predicted thermophysical properties
